title: Aqours’ Live Day 1!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Everyone! Gather around~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>W-, wait! I haven’t done my magic gathering ritual yet....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Come on, Maru will help you with it later zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby will also help, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh, then I’ll help too! It sounds fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey! Don’t make fun of a sacred ritual!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>We’re not making fun of it at all. Right, Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s right, Yoshiko-chan. Leave it to us♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! Geez, you guys....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s a ritual praying for the success of our live. So naturally, everyone wants to be a part of it. Right, everyone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! Mari will help you gather any amount of magical power you need, Yoshiko~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said, it’s Yohane.... Argh, it can’t be helped. Let’s do the ritual together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, you’re smiling, Yoshiko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yohane. Come on, we were going to form a circle, weren’t we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes. People came to spend their new year with us, so let’s make this their best moment ever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
